caption.p: (A) Asymptote, (B) point of inflection, and (C) growth rate (mean and standard error) of the three height growth curves modeled using a logistical growth model for the second growing season (2+0) of white spruce seedlings in a nursery for the three delimited groups of white spruce seed orchards (G1723, G45, G68) (see Figure 2B and text). For example, G45 means the group consisting of seedlings from seed orchards SO4 and SO5. For a given variable, means having the same letter are not significantly different according to a Bonferroni test (Î± = 0.017).
